des: "This mojo marinade is delicious for use with meats and fish before grilling.  It's a great marinade for grilled flank steak, whole pork loins, and on whole rotisserie chickens!  Meat and chicken should be marinated overnight, fish only needs one hour."
ins: Pulse the garlic and onion in a blender until very finely chopped.  Pour in orange juice, lime juice; season with cumin, oregano, lemon-pepper, black pepper, salt, cilantro, and hot pepper sauce.  Blend until thoroughly incorporated.  Pour in the olive oil, and blend until smooth.
